meta.title: print %parameters%
meta.description: prints a string to standard output

parameters.title: Expression
parameters.description: An expression that produces the string to print

meta.title: str %parameters%
meta.description:
Formats the expression into a string and returns it.
Used to express non-textual formats like numbers and date-time values.

parameters.title: Name
parameters.description: The value to make into a string representation

parameters.title: Destination variable
parameters.description: The variable to assign the string value to

meta.title: raise %parameters%
meta.description: Raises an error with the provided error message.

parameters.title: Error
parameters.description: An expression that produces a string for the error message
